title: Japan donates two fully equipped Ambulances to Sri Lanka
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By: Chandana Perera) The Chairman of Sri Lanka Business council of Japan Mr.Jagath Chandana Ramanayake officially handed over two Ambulances worth eight million rupees to President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Temple Trees on 05th January. Two fully equipped Ambulances are donated as a gift by Mr. Takano Kiyoshi, Minister…
